programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: There's a Noose Waiting for You Trinity!
programme.desc: Trinity is an ex-gunslinger desperately wanting to be forgiven and accepted by his family that he abandoned years earlier. Unfortunately for him, a ruthless bounty hunter is on his trail.

programme.title: Trinity and Sartana Are Coming
programme.desc: Sartana and Trinity set out on a grudging relationship hell bent for gold and comic brawls.

programme.title: Western Kid
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri has dubbed himself Kid Terror O’Hara, leader of a group of children who head to the ghost town of Torque to play cowboy games.

programme.title: Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold
programme.desc: Fiery blonde half-breed Yellow Hair and her easygoing sidekick the Pecos Kid are after a fortune in Mayan gold.

programme.title: Kill Johnny Ringo!
programme.desc: Johnny Ringo, a Texas Ranger, tracks down a counterfeiting ring, but the real challenge is a love triangle involving rancher Ray Scott, his sister Christine, saloon singer Annie, and gang boss Jackson. As Ringo tries to stop the counterfeiters, he learns the sheriff, his own partner, is behind it all, complicating the mission.

programme.title: Patience Has a Limit, We Don't
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Corporal MacDonald hides a large gold shipment meant for the Union. Before he can retrieve it, he's killed—taking the secret location with him. Now, a Union lieutenant and MacDonald's two sons compete to uncover the buried treasure in a tense hunt filled with danger and deception.

programme.title: The Restless Breed
programme.desc: After Mitch Baker’s father is killed by gun-runners, he follows them to Mexico for revenge. In the border town of Mission, Texas, Mitch faces off with gang leader Jim Simmons, determined to take justice into his own hands, despite warnings from the sheriff.

programme.title: Quintana: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: In a Mexican province oppressed by the evil Governor Don Juan de Leyra, the rebel-outlaw Quintana is the sole guardian of justice.

programme.title: Gunfight at Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging outsider riddles a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.

programme.title: Watch Out Gringo! Sabata Will Return
programme.desc: After a daring gold robbery, bandit Carrancho double-crosses his gang and hides the loot in a grave. As ruthless outlaws and gunmen close in, the chase for the stolen treasure turns into a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Django Challenges Sartana
programme.desc: Framed for a bank robbery, bounty killer Django's brother, Steve is lynched.

programme.title: The Godless Ones
programme.desc: An outlaw and a bounty hunter are searching for Mexican bandit Corbancho, who is running the El Paso area, and has also robbed the Bank of Tuscon of $400,000.

programme.title: Raise Your Hands, Dead Man, You're Under Arrest
programme.desc: The sole survivor, named Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), of a massacre in the North seeks revenge. After suffering the atrocity, the Kid executes a solo revenge, razes, beats and kills everyone involved in the massacre.

programme.title: Tepepa
programme.desc: In early 20th-century Mexico, the guerrilla leader Tepepa is saved from execution by Doctor Price, an Englishman. Tepepa, a hero of the Revolution, is curious about the doctor’s motives. The chilling answer: to kill him himself. A deadly game of cat and mouse begins between Tepepa and the ruthless police chief, Cascorro.
